statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE '%son';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT phone_number, name FROM customers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT c.name, ph.purchase_date, ph.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchase_history ph ON c.customer_id = ph.customer_id ORDER BY ph.purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 100;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM marketing_strategies;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'Alice';
SELECT customer_id, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM customers c INNER JOIN customer_purchases cp ON c.customer_id = cp.purchase_id INNER JOIN products p ON cp.product_id = p.product_id

SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, cp.quantity FROM customers c JOIN customer_purchases cp ON c.customer_id = cp.purchase_id JOIN products p ON cp.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*), SUM(total_amount) FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT p.product_name, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id;

SELECT products.product_name, products.price, categories.category_name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.product_id = categories.category_id
